# Description

This class thautght by Tarlay and Carnoy has the main objetive of

EDUC 306B: Global Education Policy & Organization. Subtitled "The Politics of Education Policy," this class isn't just about what happens in the classroom—it’s about why certain policies exist in the first place.

Led by two distinguished scholars, Dr. Martin Carnoy and Dr. Rebecca Tarlau, the course challenges us to look at education through the lens of political economy.
